title: Corruption Convictions Spell 10 Year Sentence For Former NOLA Mayor
teaser: Former New Orleans Mayor Ray Nagin has been sentenced to 10 years in prison for bribery, money laundering and other corruption crimes. The counts on which he was convicted cover a span that includes much of his two terms in office.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
